# codeInspectr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of codeInspectr is to make it easy to understand teh relationships of functions within a package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of codeInspectr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("cbedwards-dfw/codeInspectr")
```
